content.detailedDescription: I was driving east on tangerine when i looked to the left and saw three glowing green lights above the mountain. at first i thought they were planes but they were glowing too brightly. they were moving slowly to the north and then disappeared from view behind the mountain. the glow from the lights was about twice as bright as a star and green. i have never seen a star that looks this kind of white-ish green before. i was shocked when i noticed it wasn't anything that i was familiar with because there were a couple of sighting of ufos a week or so before in the tucson area, so i pulled over to check it out. i managed to get a picture of it before it disappeared. it moved in a very straight, slow, and steady formation. i'm pretty sure i lost sight of it because it went behind the mountain, but it just seemed to disappear.
content.summary: Triangle shaped ufo over tortolita mountain formed by three green glowing orbs

content.detailedDescription: Two days ago around 6pm clear crisp quiet blue sky after walking our dog and picking raspberries, my gf tapped me hard and said: "hey look! what's that?!" we look straight above right up and see (very high up higher than planes go but big enough to see) - a hovering beautiful very shiny metallic/steel extremely bright orange and red glowing 'aircraft'. the shape was round with triangular edges shaped sorta like an end of a squid in certain angles. after abt 4 seconds it decided to glide off vertical very fast upward. you could tell it was going really fast but amazingly no vapor or noise :) this wasn't the first time we've seen unidentifiable 'aircraft' in our area. 3rd time actually. it's amazing when you get to see 'stuff' like this. zoom in on the pic -- this was when it was really far already about to fade off upward. -- btw no its not a pic trick and no i wasn't and not on anything! lol pretty awesome. we waved to it. eerie but amazed and it was beautiful.
content.summary: Metallic/steel bright orange red glowing circular with triangular edges but at different angles shaped like end of squid/stingray with 3-4 lights on side

content.detailedDescription:
Working in my yard i noticed some aviation activity above. a red charter plane maneuvering a half-mile or so from a black 'copter that seemed to have a turret-mount camera. these two aircraft had been executing an orbit of about 4 miles in diameter, with the chopper staying put while the plane flies around it. it seemed they were filming the plane, possibly for a movie or commercial. watching with my 15x70 binocs, the plane (heading north), appears to be a cessna with a wide body to accommodate skydivers, ascending about 3,500 feet from my position, and about 45 deg above the horizon. it banks 70 deg to port as it ascends. the plane may have been at about 3,000 feet, assuming that as a minimum vfr altitude. i'm certain the distance to myself was less than 5,000 feet. in the middle of this turn an object approx 300 ft ahead of the cessna aircraft, hovers then starts to pump up & down, so fast as to almost be a blur. through my optics it looks like a great flying soup can, silver and white, in an upright attitude. it appeared to be about 20 feet tall and maybe 10 feet across, assuming my distance estimates are accurate. the sight confuses me so much, that i take the binocs and put them on a similarly distant object (i believe it was a lamp pole down the street) which behaves as i would expect and does not pump up & down like a flying piston. when i look back to the "soup can" it is gone. the aircraft and helicopter leave the scene in seconds.

the weather conditions were "severe clear" with completely unobstructed visibility. it was mid day on the desert near edwards air force base. the nearest mountains were about ten miles away, the tehachapi's and the south end of the sierras and the panamint range. my location was 9-10 miles due south of jawbone canyon, 3 miles east of california city airport, where cessna's such as the kind i saw are often chartered.
content.summary: Fixed wing and helo in ear airspace. watching f/w w/ binos, when object is viewed and begins to reciprocate at amazing speed. the plane banks away 4-500 from object.

content.detailedDescription:
Was eating at mcdonalds with my son and husband. my son loves airplanes he pointed to us to look out. it was the regular plane that passes over our town. for some reason though he was a low altitude and tilted like he was avoiding something. still looking, we noticed a dull white object going upwards. we figured it might be a balloon but that would have been impossible cus if it came from the aircraft there would have been decompression. funny thing is nobody where we were paid attention to what we were seeing. 

not but 10 seconds later two decommissioned u.S. fighter planes were chasing it... so... wouldn't there have been any mention of u.S. aircrafts over our town in canada? there was no mention of it on the news but we've seen the same regular airplane the following saturday roaming over the town multiple times. maybe he was hoping to see the same thing again.

believe what you will, but we know for a fact that ufo's will never make the news, and even when they do, government makes sure to twist the reality into a possible hoax. the day we find out the truth will most likely be too late.
content.summary: Ufo over sherbrooke, quebec being chased by 2 u.S. decommissioned fighter planes

content.detailedDescription:
We were sitting on our patio when noticed star sized objects moving over southwest night sky (about 11:00 pm).  four or five the first night would hover, make formations then seperate.  occasionally one would flash east across sky over the roof.  we watched off and on for about three hours before going to bed. during this time, an airplane flew by very low (usual for this area) and a few minutes later a jet flew by fairly low in the sky.  these object were starlike, about the size of venus.  they would make circle, zip off at acute angles and reconverge in the same area of the sky.  this occured every night until cloud cover began covering the sky labor day weekend.  the last night, we noticed at least ten of these objects lower in the southwest sky; the previous nights they had been about 90 degrees above the horizon.  as noted above, we did not
see again until last week when the night sky was clear of clouds again.  noticed two zipping across sky from west to east quickly followed by a formation of three objects slowly moving from north to south.  we have
several thirty foot tall evergreens and a small copse of woods blocking
our view of the western horizon so difficult to say where they are flying from or to.  we've lost sight of the objects as they moved into the sky behind the trees or when they fly over the building since our east horizon is also blocked by trees.  sometimes they zip off so quickly they can't be followed with the eye and other times they just simply vanish.
i've never actually seen anything like this before and quite frankly i was excited at the prospect of beings from another planet coming here but at the same time very skeptical.  couldn't be swamp gas, we're on a hill and i don't think gas would move like these.  can't be lasers-nothing to reflect off of on a clear night.  have to be above cloud cover.  has anyone else seen these?  please let me know.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Lights over bloomington week before labor day weekend and every night til cloud cover

content.detailedDescription: About 8 tonight i took my dog out in the back yard to do her business. every night i sky watch and have for years. so i looked up as soon as i stepped out the back door and there were two large amber lights going over the house. the lights were the same size and they stayed the same distance apart.. the lights went behind some trees, so i ran to the end of my yard and waited until they came in to view again. i got the feeling that these lights were at the back of a craft. the lights were low not very much over tree top level. there was no sound, if i had not looked up, would never have seen them. it was way too low for a plane. their were no landing lights, no red light. could not have been lanterns because they were flying vertical. no helicopter because they were to close not to have heard the noise helicopters make i have  no   idea ...What this was but never seen anything like it before. after lights were out of sight saw planes going same direction.
content.summary: Amber lights flew over house

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog through around our apartment complex.  i have a habit of looking at the sky and took notice of how bright jupiter was.  it was then that i noticed a red-orange orb floating in the north-eastern sky.  it did not blink (had no navigational lights.)  it glowed dimly.  it was hard to focus on as it was very high in the sky and the street lights were obscuring my vision.  i observed it fly, almost floating, until it was too small to see.  it was definitely bigger than a star, not quite as bright, and moving very fast. i live near an air force base and know it was not a c130 (the aircraft native to the base) as they fly much, much lower than this object.  i did not observe anything that looked structurally like a plane (wings, tail, etc.)  it was just a solid orb.  i did notice a helicopter and other various aircraft flying around (which is not unusual.)
content.summary: Solid, dimly lit red-orange orb floating across sky

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 9:03 pm while taking a walk on a dark street, my husband and i looked up.  i don't know why we looked up, but we felt there was a reason to.
my husband said "look at that", and pointed.  i looked up and there was almost a milky cast of an object going across the sky.  upon further inspection it was a dark, gray boomerang shape that matched the color of the sky.  however, on the front leading edge were lights intermittently blinking.  as it got right over our heads, we could see that it was very large, very quiet, and then we were better able to see that it was actually two boomerang shapes in formation.
it almost seemed to glide by.  my husband, questioning what he saw, then decided he had seen birds in migration.  however, i see birds fly over naples at night in formation, all the time, and they don't look like this.
i would say the object moved at approximately 80 miles an hour.
upon returning home, we were so excited to see it again so we laid down in the back of a pickup truck to watch the sky.  we saw the shape again, but this time it was higher, moving more quickly, and was only one boomerang shape.  we also saw shooting lights periodically in the area.  this second sighting occurred at 9:22 pm.
as the object would approach downtown where the lights were brighter, it would appear to dissolve from the sky....Probably by reflection.
content.summary: Naples boomerang sightings

content.detailedDescription: I left class at approximately 855pm and noticed 3 dots previously unseen in the sky, large groups of people were gathering to see them, they were star like in appearance, only larger. the continued to hover in place for some time almost right over the city, after 30 minutes or so i went inside, coming back out several minutes later. the ufos had moved across the sky, and up to 10 aircraft could be observed circling the sky. after a period of time they disappeared and the aircraft left.
content.summary: Three ufo's appeared over the city, for over an hour with movement and direction change

content.detailedDescription: I was out smoking a cig and noticed something in the distance that looked weird. i went inside and asked my son to come and look and grabed my binoculars at witch time we noticed the object was a grocery bag flying in an updraft. i then gave the glasses to my son to look and he noticed objects in a differant area of the sky and thought they may be falling because of the way the were fluttering. at first there were four objects and suddanely one vanished. i then observed the objects through the glasses and noticed they seemed to remain in a triangular formation for the duration of the sighting. the objects eventually just vanished. to me and my son they looked like two litter bottles tumbling.
content.summary: Watching other objects saw objects and couldnt ident.

content.detailedDescription: Sometime between 11 and midnight i took my dog out. since it was warm, i laid down in the lawn chair to watch the sky. there were patchy clouds moving steadily. occasionally, you could see stars when the clouds cleared or were thin. from the south, and headed toward the north, i spotted what i assumed was an airplane coming over the tree line. it flashed white, then red, then white, then red. it was moving at a rate of speed typical of planes. then, in an instant, it shot across the sky out of my field of view. it did not gradually speed up. it went from one movement rate -that of an airplane, instantly to a much faster movement rate -that of a shooting star, the kind that zip across the sky really fast. when it shot across the sky like a meteor, it seemed pink and also appeared to leave a trail. the object must have been just below the cloud level, because i had a clear view of it (with the clouds in the background) the entire time. the entire sighting only lasted about 5 seconds which was very frustrating. i would have loved to have seen where it went or what happened to it. my only emotional reaction was being uncertain that i could believe my own eyes, and annoyed that i didn't get to see it longer.
content.summary: Red//white blinking light with sudden increase to unbelievable speed

content.detailedDescription: In the late spring,early summer of 1974,at around 12 am, i witnessed multiple lights, 'star like'  high in the sky moving around erratically. i watched them for around 8-10 minutes. white star like objects just moving around very strangely... i thought they were going to crash in to one another as they seemed to have many near misses.  after about ten minutes of this, i had to use the restroom so i went inside. it took just a few minutes and i was on my way back outside to see if the lights were still there and i could see a glow, orange glow, through the glass of the back door of the house! startled, i decided to stay inside and watch through the window. i could see a bright orange orb, glowing way off in the distance, about 300 yards away over open pasture. it was moving closer to my location as it continued to get larger. the light hovered over the trees on the mountain to the southeast, moving northwest down over open land. this object flew right over the top of our house at close range. it lighted the entire ground under it as it moved over the house and moved down through the valley below. i watched it fly away till it just turned in to a glow through the forrest. i thought it was going to crash in the woods as i continued to watch that direction. suddenly, i looked up, and there, was the star like object i had seen earlier, in a circular formation, a cluster, and then the orange object launched vertically up in to the cluster of star like objects, merged with them and shot up out of the atmosphere! never saw this before or since. one photo shows the tree line with a gap in it... those trees died after that night... slowly jusy died in a gap about 60 to 80 feet across...
content.summary: Witnessed star like lights high above the farm, then orange and multi colored orbs flew very low over our house

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting outside admiring the stars. we see satellites quite often where we live and that is what i thought i was looking at. but this object was going straight then it would go from side to side like in a zigzag pattern then it would go in a straight line and zigzag again. it did this for about four minutes and was out of site. i thought i was imagining it , but my wife could also see it.It was at 8;41 pm and went from south to north. lots of activity going on up there. approximately 2 weeks before i watched a satellite looking object travel for a bit then stop. it did this over and over. it went from north to south. both times straight over head.
content.summary: Looked like a satelite, but it zig zagged.

content.detailedDescription:
Saw knotted rope looking vapor trail, looking west at a high altitude vapor trail.  it went from almost due west of me to the south as far as i could see. could not see in which direction it was moving, but believa it was going north.  no object could be seen. vapor trail was broken up south of pictures, but was larger and more spread out to the south, (which looked like a more normal vapor trail.

sorry but i don't know how to attatch photos to your wed site, but i do have them in a file.  willing to give to you somehow.
   john
content.summary: Knotted vapor trail     lookmore knotted before pictures taken

content.detailedDescription:
I was stunned when i saw the photograph of the sighting reported in illinois on 25 sep 11; i saw an object exactly like that in saudi arabia during the 1991 gulf war.  the entire sighting lasted approximately 1 minute.  at the time i was active duty military, deployed to the dhahran, saudi arabia area in support of operation desert shield/storm.

it was dusk and i was walking back to the field site after dinner.  i was alone; everyone else was watching the super bowl game.  i noticed three orange-hued lights moving almost directly overhead; in the exact configuration as those depicted in the illinois photo.  there was absolutely no noise associated with the sighting.  as with the illinois photo, the area encompassed by the 3 lights was without any discernable features.  it appeared as though there was nothing at all between the 3 lights, but they all moved in concert - as if they were connected to a single source. 

the size of the object was approximately the size of a fifty cent piece held at arms length.  again, as with the illinois sighting, it didn't appear to be a high altitude object.  the object was moving relatively slowly, covering the length of the object in approximately 1 second.
it was moving in an easterly direction through the very clear sky, towards a single small cloud.

the sky, with the exception of the small cloud which was not much larger than the object, was perfectly clear, which made observation very easy.

the 3 lights flew into the small cloud and that was the last i saw of them - nothing emerged from the cloud which again, which was scarcely larger then the configuration of the 3 lights.
content.summary: Sighting exactly like the one reported on 25 sep 11 in illinois

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the crow's nest at the santa cruz marina with a friend having diner. i was taking pictures of the sunset, the view and the passing boats. i did not see the objects with my own eyes but did notice them later when i was reviewing the photos.
the images where taken using and iphone 4 and at no more than 50% zoom
it is important to note that i feel the objects could be reflections in the glass but can't be certain of this. i leave it up to you to investigate. i hope it helps.
content.summary: Object appears as a sliver of light

content.detailedDescription: So i was outside grilling some chicken, talking to my mom on the phone when something caught my eye, a black dot moving through the sky in a wierd fluttery type motion.  it came down at an angle and then i saw another kinda standing still.  thats when i realized it was not an airplane so i told my mom i had to go that she wouldnt believe it i would call her back.  i ran inside my girlfriend and her mom were inside and told them there were 2 ufo outside i needed to grab my video camera.  i was in disbelief and so were they my girlfriend comes outside to see.  her eyesight is not that good so she couldnt see and said i was freakin her out so she went back inside.  the whole time i thought i was video taping talking to the camera explaining what happened turns out i wasn't.  so i lost a good five minutes of video :( but i was able to capture one of them.  the duration lasted 10 minutes in total however i only captured a couple minutes before it was out of focus or sight.  contact me with any questions.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Daylight sighting and vid

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my back garden with my girlfriend, having a cigarette, and looking at the sky we noticed a strange object, flashing in random succession, unlike usual aircraft.
these objects moved quite slowly for around 15 minutes, hovering from left across the sky, changing direction to right, and also up and down in the sky.
i attempted to film on my mobile phone, but due to camera quality could not view anything worthwhile.
the objects sometimes disappeared over the time period, but coming back after around 30 seconds. at the end of the sighting, the majority just faded but two of them shot off at high speed.
content.summary: Saw 8 lights in sky, were not airplanes .

content.detailedDescription:
I have always been a fan of the sky and the stars since a child. so i have a habit of looking up when im outside to see the beauty of it.

my mother in law and my husbands friend were visiting to see our dogs new puppies. mom and i eventually were sitting outside discussing about the puppies as shes showing me the pictures she took of them on the front steps of the house. while my husband, our daughter and his friend were inside. i look up into the sky to my right side an noticed 2 orange orbs flying across next to each other. when i did i said "mom? what the heck is that?" she said,"probably a plane honey." i said,"no i really doubt that its a plane. mom look" she states "what am i suppose to be looking at?" i said,"just look an you'll see. hurry before it goes out of sight!" so she gets up off the steps and sees them. opens the door of the house hollering for my husband an his friend to come outside.

i walk up the road to follow these orbs. my mom is following behind me. my daughter is questioning my husband and exclaiming how scared she was (shes 6) while my husband is answering her as hes comforting as well. and my husbands friend was just in awe.  

these 2 orbs were flying wobbly next to each other with no sound or trace of residue behind them,no sight of the normal blinking lights you would see on a plane either. from a distance they looked like a glowing orange circle (best description like a miniature sun) with a tint of red that moved in a circled motion around the object. eventually i lost sight of them. thought maybe they went into a different direction.

my mom an i were puzzled as to what they were because we never seen such a thing before. my husband,daughter and his friend went back inside the house. (as my husband is trying to make light of the sighting with jokes for our daughters sake.)

my mom an i then started discussing of the sighting of it possibly being a ufo as i ended the conversation with, "now i need a nice tall glass of wine!" we start laughing an began to go inside the house. until i look up again an seen another object on the same right side. i said,"mom theirs another one!" instead of going in the direction i went before. i went in the opposite direction up the road to get a better view with out the trees being in the way. it had the same swaying/wobbly motion as it flown in the sky. same colors,shape,size etc as the last 2 i saw. though this one i was able to see what happened of how the other 2 had disappeared so quickly. after flying a good distance it stopped and hovered still in place for about maybe 4 minutes (my mother in law was able to take pictures at this time.) after the 4 minutes had past the orange color had then turned white, shrunk in size an dimmed out. just vanished ! 

me and my mom were just shocked like oh my heavens ! was very weird and creepy we felt. we stayed outside for a good 45 minutes talking about it after to see if we would be able to spot anymore. though we didn't after that. i definitely got my wine after! my husband was puzzled and said how he thought it was weird too. my mom then plugs her camera into the laptop and loads the pictures she took. these pictures look to be nothing like what we saw. the pictures shows a disc which created more confusion as to what it originally could had been. theyre not very good pictures but if you would to zoom in on them you can see the object better.
content.summary: Ufo sighting september 24,2011 between time frame of 10-11pm

content.detailedDescription: 11/26/2011 a group/cluster of sparking/flashing-or pulsating white orbs( 6-12 0f them) witnessed from c470 w. ascending from what appeared to be lockheed martin deer creek canyon facility...Time of event was between 10p.M.And 10:30 p.M. (mountain time) did anyone else see this event, and the objects, that i am describing???
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other,Unknown
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Circle,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Teardrop,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: 11/26/2011ufo(s) witnessed ascending from what appeared to be lockheed martin

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i camping in the adirondacks and did not have watches or our cell phones on because they are useless up there. we were sitting by the campfire just watching the sky on sunday night.
we observed an object, very high in the sky, with an irregular flashing, unlike a passenger plane that has constant, regular flashing.  this object appeared from the north, was moved in a mostly circular pattern heading south, west, north, east then south again.  speed did not appear unusual, only the flashing and flight pattern.  because ft. drum is relatively close we were speculating this was merely a military aircraft. 

immediately after the craft made an apparent circle, slightly to the east of it, my friend noticed another craft so high it was just a pinprick of light (or a very high flying plane).  we lost sight of the first craft almost immediately after seeing the second one but between the two of us both we sighted at the same time for a moment.

this one had a constant, non-flashing light and was flying south.  as we watched this second craft it appeared to stop for apx. 2 ��� 3 seconds then continue its course. it turned slightly east, stopped again, started again and would appear to accelerate slightly for a second or two then go back to its ���normal��� flight speed which could be compared to a very high plane. this pattern happened a couple times and then it just stopped.  we continued watching for apx 20-30 minutes but it did not move.  i was tired and went to sleep; my friend tired of watching it too but when he did look back about an hour later it was gone.

this second craft stopped at a point in the sky which created 2 triangle shaped constellations. in the first the craft was the left point, nearly parallel with the right point (a star), the third point (a star) at the bottom.
in the second triangle the craft created the top point of a triangle.  it was positioned to the right and higher then ursa major, left of and lower then of camelopardalls, 

my friend had a night vision scope (sorry i do not know the model but can get it).  the magnification isn���t great but it did slightly magnify the craft and it was not an exact circle.  at first there appeared to be a tail, like a tear drop but less pronounced, to the west of it.  a few minutes later it appeared more as a kidney shape but most of that shape was caused by the light that appeared to be emitted. the object was a slightly different color then the stars around it but being a night vision scope everything appears green tinted so exact color was hard to observe.  at one point it did appear slightly orange to the naked eye.
again, there was a glow around it like it was emitting light differently than the nearby stars. 

a few weeks ago my daughter and i were watching the sky and it looked like a star just disappeared in the same area of sky, very possibly the exact location because i recall seeing the triangle.  we see so much strangeness that i didn���t pay much attention to it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Non-flashing, light emmiting, star-like object hovered a long time forming triangles in the sky

content.detailedDescription: In a plane coming into los angeles and it was the same height of the plane which was 1-2,000 feet.  it was just hovering stationary.  not big enough to have any travelers, i believe.  but just there.
content.summary: See below

content.detailedDescription: I drove a ford cargo van for an overnite delivery company in indianapolis in 2006.  my route had 50 stops and i drove the same route each night travelling about 400 miles each evening.  as i was heading west from us 31 to the town of culver on a two lane country road around 1:00 am when  i came over the top of a hill and down the hill i witnessed something out of the ordinary.  what was normally a farm field pasture littered with some implements and a few head of cattle, now appeared to have the orange glow of a campfire.  i thought to myself, that is kind of unusual because it was quite some distance from any residence.  as i approached the area, i rolled down the window of the van and stopped to see if this was a campfire or perhaps an accidental fire.  my eye level was about the top of the wire fence and the weeds that had grown up along the fencerow.  what i witnessed about twenty feet away gave me chills and caused me a great deal of anxiety.  what i saw was a highly reflective dome just over the top of the weeds about 20'-35'in diameter reflecting the color of the night sky with just the faintest sliver of an outline that defined its shape.  but the weirdest thing about it was, it was mimicking a fire, soft orange and reddish undulations were reflecting off its surface but even stranger were the spark embers that normally float off a fire, they were recreated in a pixel type format, very quick dashes of light that floated in a zigzag geometric pattern making sharp right angles in a multi-sized square track across the surface of the dome. the light even dimmed as to copy an ember burning out. it was semi-convincing in reproducing a campfire but it was not natural.  when i saw that it scared me and i immediately drove off.  i was so close to it that i thought if lingered there any longer who knows what might happen.
content.summary: Nighttime landed domed craft in a rural farm field

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my front porch around 9:30 p.M. and noticed an object that seemed flat with red and white lights in the sky and thought at first it was a plane, but there was no noise  and it was floating slowly. then it stopped above the tree tops around half a mile away and it slowly descended down behind the trees. i know this was not an airplane and it was not a helicopter. i watched for a few minutes but it never reappeared.
content.summary: Flat object with about 6 to 7  red and white lights visible descending behind trees about half a mile from my house.E.

content.detailedDescription: In the backyard just looking up at the sky. i noticed a blue light about the size of a penny or dime from about 4 feet away. the object was briefly still the faded to an orange or redish before slowly moving across the sky at about 30, 000 feet. it went for about 3 minutes then it just vanished. i believe it was to slow to be a shooting star or a meter of somesort. the object just popped into the air then vanished a few minutes later.
content.summary: Very bright light almost like a welding spark. then faded to a red orange

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a football game in bartlett, il. where my grandson was playing and turned around from watching the game at the sound of a 767 airliner in a landing approach to ohare airport coming from my right to my left.  what caught my eye was a small black dot just under the fusilage forward of the  left side horizontal tail assembly.  it was just moving along with the aircraft until it passed in front of me when it slowly began to slide rearward maintaining the same distance under the aircraft as when i first observed it.  as it moved away from me it continued to move rearward until it became to small for me to distinguish.  it's last position was just behind and below the fusilage.  the object was in sight from 15-20 seconds.  of course being the quick on my feet mufon field investigator that i am i snapped several pictures with my expensive twelve megapixel digital camera that i was carrying in my hand...Not!  no instead i stood there trying to come up with a logical explanation for what i was seeing, and then it was gone. 

i would judge the apparent size of the aircraft at it's closest approach as the size of a half dollar held at arms length.  the size of the dot was impossible to judge.  at first i thought it was one of those floaters you sometime see as black dots that are inside your eye but when i looked away the dot stayed with the airplane and disappeared when i looked completely away.  a floater kind of moves around with a kind of slow motion when you move your point of focus around.  this dot stayed right with the airplane and didn't behave like any floater i have seen.
content.summary: A black dot followed a 767 airliner underneath the tail from about 2 oclock to 10 oclock with 12 oclock being south facing

content.detailedDescription: First main object was very bright white light almost star like, but it was too early to be a star of that size and brightness.  it did move from the southeast in a straight line to the northeast and then just stopped.  a few moments later, a smaller object also moving up from the southwest was heading directly for the larger white object.  this smaller one had all the colors and was flashing and seemed like it was changing shape.  then it ejected two small objects that moved slowly away from its parent object. those two small objects also had colored lights but not as bright.  clouds moved in and i could no longer see the colored lights but the whole time this was going on, the larger bright light was in the same position in the sky and did not move, nor change in its brightness.  then more clouds moved overhead and i could no longer see the white light.
content.summary: Bright white light and three smaller multi-colored lights around 6:30pm

content.detailedDescription: Pulled up to an intersection facing east in my car, and it looked almost like orange-red lights were strung across the sky. the only way to describe the light is that it was similar to the burning embers remaining after detonating large firworks. not terribly bright, almost glowing. there was no noise -- no rotors, no engines, nothing.  orbs were moving somewhat slowly in formation toward the west, stretched across the sky.  again, it was strange because there was no noise as they passed overhead. sped home to show my son, but they were obscured by trees.  drove back to the original location, and while it couldn't have been more than 10 minutes, there were only two remaining in the sky.  they were high in the air, but the lights did not look like airplane lights.  watched as the last two passed overhead to the west.  i have tried to find out more about this fleet of orbs, but there was nothing reported in the local paper.
content.summary: Fleet of silent red-orange orbs, traveling west, single file, from horizon to overhead

content.detailedDescription:
Place: my friends house in her drive way
notice: bright and golden light, looked like a star pulsating
object: firs thought it was a star then noticed it accended slowly up and then vanished
actions: it slowly accended up, took about 30-45 seconds and then vanished in under a second
feelings: i was scared but then i was a bit excited... it was my first "real" look at one
lose sight: it vanished in under a second
content.summary: Brigh golden light slowly accending

content.detailedDescription: Saw 2 glowing amber-yellow orbs silently flying in from the ocean just south of fort bragg. they flew inland a mile or so and upwards into a wierd, black cloud. then 2 more appeared and followed the same path into the cloud. soon lines of 4 and 8 came in like freeway lines at 3 different levels, all into the bottom of the growing cloud. sirens in nearby ft bragg went off. heard neighbor yell on the phone "ive never seen anything like this!" lost count at aroung 150 total last few came , 2 joined into one and flew into the cloud and that was it
content.summary: Armada of 150= glowing orange-yellow orbs flowing in even numbers into a large, black cloud, silent
